channel.title: nope on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in nope on Barefoot Rob

item.title: magnets haven't arrived yet
item.description: 21:49 Wednesday 16 November 2016 JST Speaking of Home, I asked Lin if my magnets had arrived. They haven’t. <dog_howling.gif>

item.title: aint got middleman set up on this machine yet
item.description: 16:43 Wednesday 08 July 2015 JST And Emacs app with its own window isn’t working either. I’m using Emacs within Terminal window via command line. Only bummer is not being able to point and click with mouse to move the point. No internet access now, but I may try to install Middleman on here or I might try to install Hugo (is that the fast one?) which I didn’t fully finish testing on Debian box before.

item.title: student no show or something or both
item.description: 10:35 Saturday 18 April 2015 JST I don’t see my student where I expected to see her at 10am. Not sure what happened, though I am sure I don’t have her name nor phone number. Maybe I shoulda gotta that info last week hahaha.
